'Windsor' is the southernmost city in Canada and is located in Southwestern
Ontario at the western end of the heavily populated Quebec CityâWindsor
Corridor. It is located in Essex County although administratively separated from
the county government. Separated by the Detroit River, Windsor is located south
of Detroit, Michigan in the United States. Windsor is known as "The City of
Roses" and residents are known as Windsorites. It is the only city in Canada
that looks north to the United States.
categories: Populated places on the Great Lakes
